1: <pb/><e>A ton bit David ti'</e> <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, manchak in ak' cuenta yin yowal a c'ul. Man aoc tz'um win yin a k'ak'alc'ulal.</t>
2: <t>Mayal oc txolan a julbal win. A a k'ab max tit wiban.</t>
3: <t>A yuj yowal a c'ul, caw wal ya'ay masanil in mimanil chi wabej yujc'al max oc in mul ayach.</t>
4: <t>A in yobc'ulalil chemantok wiban axca ikatz, tol c'amxa chi techaj wuj.</t>
5: <t>Yujc'al in pitalil xan lananxa yakbitok in yas, cax chi k'atok.</t>
6: <t>Nojan in ayok chin beyi. C'amxac'al tzet chi el waloni. C'am chi xew in cusilal jabok.</t>
7: <t>Xiwil chi tz'atok in nan yuj k'ak'al ilya', cax ijan chin cam chi wabej.</t>
8: <t>Buyan inxac'al, cax c'amxa wip. Chin k'akwi yuj in bilc'ulal.</t>
9: <pb/><t>Mamin Wajawil, ojtak masanil wochwan. A wal yet chi sik'son jay in c'ul, a sat yayji ocok.</t>
10: <t>Aymanxac'al chi bil wanimail, bijijixac'al yel wip, c'amxa chi je' wilwi.</t>
11: <t>A eb in watx'il anima, c'al eb junej chin ec' yetok, max toj eb najat, yetok eb cajan in cawilal, max bescan el ba eb in c'atan yuj in yas.</t>
12: <t>A eb chi yochej chin yak' camok, lanan yaon ay eb in yalil. A eb chi yochej chi etnencantok in nabal, lanan yel ti' eb win yin tzetbil chi yun wetaxcan elok. C'am chi xew eb naobtanen tzet ok in yut eb yin ewantakil.</t>
13: <pb/><t>A pax ayin xin, axcaok tol c'am chi wab tzet chi yal eb, axcaok tol makan in txiquin; axca tol c'am chi je' in k'anjabi, c'am tzet chi wala'.</t>
14: <t>Lajan in axca mac c'am chi yabej cax c'am chi je' yalon ba.</t>
15: <t>Ach Jehová, achc'al chach waoc yipok in c'ul. Ach Wajaw Dios, ok in a tak'wej.</t>
16: <t>Asan tol c'amokab chin is tzeyej eb, ẍi in c'ul. Manchak yak' eb bit yet tzalojc'ulal win ta chin ayc'ayi. A jun tu' chin k'an ayach.</t>
17: <pb/><t>Palta lananxa wayc'ay chi wabej. C'am chin xew yin in yatakilal jabok.</t>
18: <t>Ok walajtek in mul xin. Manxa animaok ay in c'ul yuj in yobtakil.</t>
19: <t>Mayal wal aj can eb ajc'ul oc win. Xiwil eb c'am chin ocheni, caxc'al c'am in mul bay eb.</t>
20: <t>Yobc'al chi yut eb c'ul win yuj in watx'c'ulal bay eb. Chi oc eb ajc'ulal win, yujc'al chin beybalnej watx'c'ulalil.</t>
21: <pb/><t>Mamin Jehová, manchak in a bekcanok. Ach in Diosal, man a besil a ba ayin.</t>
22: <t>Ach Wajawil, ach in Colomal, titan ayman in ul a coloni.</t>
